name: Personality Quiz
description: Assessment quiz with personality-type results. Ideal for learning style assessments, self-discovery, and interest profiling.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate personality quiz with results and questions

results.id: string - Unique identifier for this result
results.title: string - Result/personality type name
results.description: string - Description of this personality type

answers.resultId: string - ID of the result this answer points to

results.title: Visual Learner
results.description: You learn best through images, diagrams, and visual representations. Try using mind maps and color-coded notes!

results.title: Auditory Learner
results.description: You learn best through listening and discussion. Try recording lectures and participating in study groups!

results.title: Kinesthetic Learner
results.description: You learn best through hands-on experience. Try experiments, role-playing, and building models!

results.title: Reading/Writing Learner
results.description: You learn best through reading and writing. Try taking detailed notes and reading textbooks!

answers.text: Watch a video or look at diagrams
